attributes.action: Prevent the Sun 'newspaper' from launching The Sun Military Awards -also to be known as the 'Millies' on the grounds of decency.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The scheme should be prevented as it totally cheapens the Armed Forces and their role.
This is not the way to show appreciation of The Armed Forces.
And it is not the way to single out particular 'nominees' as ALL members of the Armed Forces do a superb job.
Pleae help stop it before it starts!
